definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: An investigation of foraminifera was conducted in the last glacial loess along the coast of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 通過對渤海沿岸末次冰期黃土中有孔蟲化石的研究。

sentences.english: Pleistocene glaciation caused the extinction of many species.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀冰期，使許多物種絕滅。

sentences.english: The solar activity and volcanic eruptions are the main factors of climatic changes during the Little Ice Age.
sentences.chinese: 太陽活動和火山活動是小冰期氣候變化的主要因素。

sentences.english: During "interglacials", the temperature was somewhat warmer and the ice retreated.
sentences.chinese: 間冰期時，氣溫則有點暖和，冰層就慢慢融化。

sentences.english: In the region that comparison glacial has experienced a series of rapid climate fluctuation.
sentences.chinese: 說明靖遠地區在末次冰期經歷了一系列快速氣候波動。

sentences.english: Datangpo Formation deposited in transitional facies during interglaciation.
sentences.chinese: 大塘坡組爲間冰期海陸過渡相沉積。

sentences.english: The next Ice Age could take only weeks to engulf Britain.
sentences.chinese: 下次冰期吞噬英國可能只需幾個星期。

sentences.english: Both oceanic crust and continental crust type volcanic actions influenced the forming of the Great Ice Age.
sentences.chinese: 洋殼型火山與陸殼型火山共同作用形成大冰期。

sentences.english: From the old ice stage to new one, the snowline rose higher and higher.
sentences.chinese: 從新到老，每次冰期的雪線下降幅度一次比一次大。

sentences.english: The external cause was due to the influence of the Quaternary Period glacier.
sentences.chinese: 農業起源的外因則是受晚更世冰期的影響。

sentences.english: Comparing with last interglacial, the climate change in Holocene is more gently.
sentences.chinese: 全新世與末次間冰期對比，總體氣候變化較平緩。

sentences.english: After the Sinian Great Ice Age, the Phanerozoic started.
sentences.chinese: 震旦紀大冰期後開始了顯生宙。

sentences.english: The formation of the Kanas Lake is closely related to the glacial erosion and dam during the Last Glacial.
sentences.chinese: 喀納斯湖的形成與末次冰期冰川作用關係密切。

definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
Pleistocene (geological epoch from 2m years ago, covering the most recent ice ages)
Phanerozoic, geological eon lasting since the Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪[Han2 wu3 ji4], c. 540m year ago
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
